setting.environment: Exterior doorway with textured stone or natural concrete wall and a dark painted wooden door
setting.atmosphere: Warm, sensual, high-end editorial lifestyle aesthetic with subtle tribal influence

viewing_angle.camera_height: Approximately chest height of the subject
viewing_angle.angle: Straight-on with a subtle downward tilt
viewing_angle.perspective_effect: Natural human-eye perspective with flattering compression, no distortion

lighting.shadow_characteristics: High-contrast shadows carving out muscle definition, abs, and facial structure

composition.rule_of_thirds: Face and upper torso aligned near center
composition.visual_balance: Balanced between illuminated subject and darker background
composition.depth: Moderate depth created primarily through lighting contrast
composition.leading_elements: Door frame and wall subtly guide attention toward the subject

image_quality.sharpness: Extreme sharpness on face, bust, and abdominal definition
image_quality.dynamic_range: Wide dynamic range preserving highlights and deep shadows
image_quality.overall_style: Luxury Instagram fitness and tribal-inspired editorial photography

overall_mood.aesthetic: Indigenous-inspired fantasy meets elite fitness editorial
overall_mood.visual_focus: Powerful emphasis on facial beauty, extreme body definition, and curves
